withImg: Write down the word that is shown in the picture
withVoice: Listen to the pronunciation of the word and then write it down
withTranscription: Look at the transcription and write down the word
withVoiceTranscription: Look at the transcription of the word, listen to its pronunciation and write it down
withSentenceFilling: Choose the correct answer and fill in the gap
withSentenceMaking: Make up a sentence. Change the ending of the verb or use the verb 'to be' if needed
withExtraWordSearching: Write down the word that is NOT related to the given theme
